title: Calculating Greatest Common Divisor
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `functools.reduce()` and `math.gcd()` functions to find the greatest common divisor of a list of integers.

meta.title: Mathematics | Greatest Common Divisor | Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to find the greatest common divisor (GCD) of a list of integers using Python and the functools.reduce() and math.gcd() functions.
meta.keywords: mathematics, greatest common divisor, gcd, programming, python, functools, math

verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
